statements.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS COLUMNS ( TAB VARCHAR(400) NOT NULL, COLIDX INT NOT NULL, COLNAME VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MEMBER ( ID VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, PW VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, ENTRY TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, MODIFICATION TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, LEVEL INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ID) ) ENGINE = InnoDB
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS HISTORY_SIGN_ON ( NO INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, ID VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, IP VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, TIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (NO) ) ENGINE = InnoDB

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS HISTORY_LEVEL ( NO INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, REG_TIME DATETIME NOT NULL, ID VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, OVERVIEW VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, CONCERN INT NOT NULL, CAUTION INT NOT NULL, DANGER INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (NO) ) ENGINE = InnoDB

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS INIT_STRAIN ( NO INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, SILO_NO INT NOT NULL, DIRECTION VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL, CHANNEL VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, STRAIN_INIT FLOAT(8,3) NOT NULL, TEMP FLOAT(6,2) NOT NULL, CALIBRATION_FACTOR FLOAT(3,1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (NO) ) ENGINE = InnoDB

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS INIT_DISPLACEMENT ( NO INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, SILO_NO INT NOT NULL, DIRECTION VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL, CHANNEL VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, ANGLE FLOAT(11,9) NOT NULL, TEMP FLOAT(6,2) NOT NULL, SCALE_FACTOR FLOAT(6,4) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (NO) ) ENGINE = InnoDB
